headline: PIZZA HUT® IS HOOKING YOU UP WITH THE NEW HUT LOVER'S PIZZAS®: FOUR LEGENDARY PIZZAS. ONE UNDENIABLE PRICE.
summary: Pizza Hut® is hooking pizza lovers up with more of what they love this summer with the launch of the Hut Lover's Pizzas® – a limited-time lineup of four over-the-top pizzas, each piled high with premium toppings priced at $12.99 for one large pizza. Pizza Hut is delivering more of what fans love: more toppings, more flavor, more good times – for less. The Hut Lover's Pizzas are here to prove that legendary pizza doesn't have to come with large price tag.
